name: 陳錦文
objective:
本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括 (1) 原子鍵結與配位 (2) 晶體 [原子規律性](3) 固相中之不規律性 (4) 相平衡 (5) 材料微結構 (6) 反應速率 (7) 材料破壞學 (8) 導電材與半導材料 (9) 陶瓷材料 (10) 聚合物及複合材料
This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1) Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2) Crystal Structure (3) Disorder in Solid Phase (4) Phase Equilibria (5) Microstructures (6) Reaction Rate (7) Deformation and Fracture (8) Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9) Ceramic Materials (10) Polymer and Composites.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Polymer Material Synthesis (高分子材料的合成介紹)
Week 2: Polymer Composition, Structure, and Performance (高分子組成、結構和性能關係)
Week 3: Glass Transition and Melting Temperature (玻璃轉換和熔點)
Week 4-5 Polymer Crystallization (高分子結晶)
Week 6: Tensile test (拉伸試驗)
Week 7: Fracture behavior (斷裂行為)
Week 8: Flexure test and Impact test (彎曲試驗和衝擊試驗)
Week 9: Time-temperature superposition (時溫疊加)
Week 10: Mechanical models (機械模型)
Week 11: Dynamic mechanical analysis (動態力學分析)
Week 12: Midterm exam
Week 13-18 Presentation
scorePolicy:
1.　　期中考 / Midterm: 40%
2.　　期末報告 / Final presentation: 40% 
3.　　出席 Attend: 20%
materials:
1、　　Introduction to Physical Polymer Science, 4th Edition, L.H. Sperling (https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/book/10.1002/0471757128)
2、　　Polymer Chemistry, 3rd Edition, Timothy P. Lodge, Paul C. Hiemen (https://www.taylorfrancis.com/books/mono/10.1201/9780429190810/polymer-chemistry-timothy-lodge-paul-hiemenz)
